entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Fog patches late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
